alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 7:41AM CDT until June 29 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN FREMONT...MILLS...WESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...NORTHEASTERN SARPY...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...NORTH CENTRAL OTOE...EASTERN DOUGLAS AND EASTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 741 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Council Bluffs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Council Bluffs Airport around 745 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Treynor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
